title: @Lyte Please check my account
body: I need to know if I qualify for the mystery gift please.

replies.body: If you haven’t received a chat restriction, ranked restriction, 14-day ban or permanent ban in 2014, and you meet the requirements to receive a Mystery Gift (you’re Level 5 or higher and there are at least 10 skins you don’t own), you'll quality for a Mystery Gift.

> [{quoted}](name=ChimeiTekinaNasu,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=7Lv15tIK,comment-id=00000006,timestamp=2015-01-07T17:45:24.739+0000)
>
> I thought....I had already asked this, but I don't see my comment that I thought I put. lol. So I will ask again. So would my second account also be getting a mystery gift?? lol. Because I haven't been on it in about a year and was thinking of getting on it soon.

I'm actually not sure on that one, I'll have to ask someone who's working on the roll out of the mystery gifts.
Oh, okay. If not, I might try getting on it today and do a Co-Op on it to sort of get it active.

> [{quoted}](name=ChimeiTekinaNasu,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=7Lv15tIK,comment-id=0000000600000000,timestamp=2015-01-07T17:52:12.446+0000)
>
> Oh, okay. If not, I might try getting on it today and do a Co-Op on it to sort of get it active.

Spoke to someone on the team, and they said that "Any account over level 5 that has at least 10 un-owned skins will be eligible to receive a skin, so yes, players could potentially receive the Mystery Gift on their main and smurf accounts."

You can find more info on inactivity [here](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751914-Summoner-Name-Clean-Up-#q1). I'd go ahead and play game, just to be safe.
Thanks. >=D and did my Co-Op to get it active. I need to change my name on it. Too bad I'll only be able to get RP on one account when I get some for bonus. lol

What exactly do you mean by chat restriction? Is that when you spam a couple lines then you get blocked for like a minute? Because i do that aalot with my friends when were all queued as a 5 man team and we just spam eachother. It would be a real bummer if that counts as a disqualification..

Not that. Chat restriction is a punishment that lasts for several games (for some people, 100 or more). You're only allowed to chat a few times per game while restricted. If you'd received a chat restriction, you would know.

Okay, thats what i thought it was. I had just read a post earlier that said chat restrictions were the spam blocks. I just needed a second word. Anyway thankyou Megaman. Thank you RIOT. Happy new year! :D

> [{quoted}](name=xXGiordanoXx,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=7Lv15tIK,comment-id=00000002,timestamp=2015-01-07T04:06:06.114+0000)
>
> What exactly do you mean by chat restriction? Is that when you spam a couple lines then you get blocked for like a minute? Because i do that aalot with my friends when were all queued as a 5 man team and we just spam eachother. It would be a real bummer if that counts as a disqualification..

Nope, that's a bit different. You should be okay. :]
So I got a few 24-48 hour bans for leaving games, not for raging. Does that mean I qualify or naw?
You anniying afker

Will this be for champions you own, or for every champion.
If the latter, will it come with the champion if we don't have them?
Thanks in advance!

> [{quoted}](name=Kroshkaphae,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=7Lv15tIK,comment-id=00000003,timestamp=2015-01-07T04:26:37.961+0000)
>
> Will this be for champions you own, or for every champion.
> If the latter, will it come with the champion if we don't have them?
> Thanks in advance!

This would be for champions you currently own.

Does this mean my second account will also be getting one?? lol. Haseo2468. Even though I kind of forgot about it. Almost level 15 but haven't been on it in about a year. I was planning to get back on it soon though.
What if you got one in 2015 are you still eligible?
Well based on what he or she said if you got one in 2014 you won't qualify. But if you got one in 2015 i don't think it counts.
thanks
I hope you get a mystery gift bro!
Okay. I dont think i have gotten any of those i think.
when is this supposed to happen?

> [{quoted}](name=Get Rekkkt,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=7Lv15tIK,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2015-01-07T02:51:31.979+0000)
>
> when is this supposed to happen?

They'll be rolling out over the next few days.
am i on the good list?

It once happened to me that while logging in a message popped up alerting me to cool down my behaviour or else i got harder sanctions.
Thing is, i did not remember continous flaming or anything for, like, months ( if you check my play log you can see I had to stop playing from a while due to time costraints, and when this happened i was already playing less and less), or at least as I remember!

I am not worried or angered, back when it happened i was just intrigued, but now do you think that will deny me the reward? Or it is just for heavier sanctions?

well i got a chat restriction once before from a rank game where someone got in a fight with me. he did start it though but i never emailed riot about it. so does this mean i wont be gettin mystery gift? '-'
Depends did it happen in 2014 if so then no your not :/
aw..oh well, guess thats what happen when you play with ragers '-'
Sorry dude better luck next year :/
